control_attributes.control_description: The organization accepts the results of an assessment of [Assignment: organization-defined information system] performed by [Assignment: organization-defined external organization] when the assessment meets [Assignment: organization-defined requirements].
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system performs security compliance checks on constituent system components prior to the establishment of the internal connection.

Control Statement: The organization accepts the results of an assessment of [Assignment: organization-defined information system] performed by [Assignment: organization-defined external organization] when the assessment meets [Assignment: organization-defined requirements].
